title: Stuck in reconnect page after winning rank
body: Will I receive my lp after the server issues have been fixed. I just won 1 lp to get into promos and now I fear I may have to do another just to earn 1 measly lp. Please put it in my account if I do not receive it.

replies.body: same here. disconnect after victory, no match history no ip lp

yeah me too fkn sucks, maybe it has something to do with them changing up the servers???

it told me i would have a loss and a time penalty - if so i'll send in a ticket
Same, but our team dc'd before the game was over and were literally hitting their nexus. Can't connect to the game and it would of been a win in my promos.
ive had the same problem. won my game and now im also stuck in the reconnect page. really hope i get that lp
